item.title: Text Search on PostgreSQL
item.description: PostgreSQL has out of box support for text search. Assume we have a table of documents: CREATE TABLE documents ( id SERIAL NOT NULL, doc TEXT ) INSERT INTO documents (doc) VALUES ("lorem ipsum ....."); INSERT INTO documents (doc) VALUES ("quick brown fox ....."); Output: id | doc ----------------- 0 | "Lorem ipsum ....." 1 | "Quick brown fox ..." A simple text search is a basic requirement in any system.
